1 [BoardGame:BlockIcon] for each card in your hand.

cards.name: Wish

Gain [BoardGame:StrIcon]  ([BoardGame:StrIcon] ) , 10 (15) [BoardGame:BlockIcon] , or
[BoardGame:MiracleIcon] [BoardGame:MiracleIcon] [BoardGame:MiracleIcon] [BoardGame:MiracleIcon]  ([BoardGame:MiracleIcon] ) .

Even in the Board Game, there is no escape.
Nothing to see here.

cards.name: Become Almighty

4 [BoardGame:HitIcon]
+!M! damage if you have 10 or more Gold.

cards.name: Master of Strategy
cards.description:
Draw 3 (4) cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Mayhem
cards.description:
Once per turn:
Draw a card.
Immediately play it for 0 Energy.

cards.name: The Bomb
cards.description: At the end of 3 turns, deal 10 (12) damage to ALL enemies, then Exhaust this card.

relics.name: Burning Blood
relics.description:
End of combat:
Heal 1 HP.
relics.flavorText: Your body's own blood burns with an undying rage.

relics.name: Cracked Core
relics.description:
Start of combat:
Channel 1 Lightning.
relics.flavorText: The mysterious life force which powers the Automatons within the Spire. It appears to be cracked.

relics.name: Loaded Die
relics.description:
[BoardGame:Die4Icon] [BoardGame:Die5Icon] 1 [BoardGame:BlockIcon]
[BoardGame:Die6Icon] Trigger a die relic ability.
relics.flavorText: Best not dwell on the other meaning of the word.

relics.name: Miracles
relics.description: Holds up to five [BoardGame:MiracleIcon] generated during combat. Right-Click to use them to gain [W] or save them up to pay for cost X cards.
relics.flavorText: "Let me tell you about the time I played Conjure Blade+ for 11 Energy..."

relics.name: Ring of the Snake
relics.description:
Start of combat:
Draw 2 cards.
relics.flavorText: Made from a fossilized snake. Represents great skill as a huntress.

relics.name: Shivs
relics.description: Holds [BoardGame:ShivIcon] generated during combat. Right-Click to use them to Attack for 1 damage.
relics.flavorText: It's like bringing a knife to a card fight.

relics.name: Akabeko
relics.description:
Once per combat:
Gain [BoardGame:StrIcon] for one Attack.
Right-Click to activate.
relics.flavorText: "Muuu~"

relics.name: Anchor
relics.description:
Start of combat:
2 [BoardGame:BlockIcon]
relics.flavorText: Holding this miniature trinket, you feel heavier and more stable.

relics.name: Bag of Preparation
relics.description:
Start of combat:
Draw 2 cards.
relics.flavorText: Oversized adventurer's pack. Has many pockets and straps.

relics.name: Blood Vial
relics.description:
Start of combat:
Heal 1 HP.
relics.flavorText: A vial containing the blood of a pure and elder vampire.

relics.name: Captain's Wheel
relics.description:
[BoardGame:Die3Icon]
3 [BoardGame:BlockIcon]
relics.flavorText: Wooden trinket carved with delicate precision. A name is carved into it but the language is foreign.

relics.name: Centennial Puzzle
relics.description:
Once per combat:
Draw 3 cards if you lost HP this combat.
Right-Click to activate.
relics.flavorText: Upon solving the puzzle, you feel a powerful warmth in your chest.

relics.name: Duality
relics.description:
[BoardGame:Die2Icon] 2 [BoardGame:BlockIcon]
[BoardGame:Die4Icon] Deal 2 damage.
relics.flavorText: "And the sun was extinguished forever, as if curtains fell before it." - Zoroth

relics.name: Happy Flower
relics.description:
[BoardGame:Die3Icon] [BoardGame:Die4Icon]
Gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: This unceasingly joyous plant is a popular novelty item among nobles.

relics.name: Ink Bottle
relics.description:
[BoardGame:Die5Icon] [BoardGame:Die6Icon]
Draw a card.
relics.flavorText: Once exhausted, appears to refill itself in a different color.

relics.name: Lantern
relics.description:
Start of combat:
Gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: An eerie lantern which illuminates only for the wielder.

relics.name: Nilry's Codex
relics.description:
[BoardGame:Die2Icon] Draw a card.
[BoardGame:Die4Icon] Trigger a [BoardGame:Die2Icon] ability. Its owner gains the effect.
relics.flavorText: Crafted by the infamous game master himself. Said to expand one's mind.

relics.name: Oddly Smooth Stone
relics.description:
[BoardGame:Die4Icon]
2 [BoardGame:BlockIcon] to any player.
relics.flavorText: You have never seen something so smooth and pristine. This must be the work of the Ancients.

relics.name: Omamori
relics.description: You can't gain Curses.
relics.flavorText: A common charm for staving off vile spirits. This one seems to possess a spark of divine energy.

relics.name: Orichalcum
relics.description:
End of turn:
1 [BoardGame:BlockIcon] if you don't have any Block.
relics.flavorText: A green tinted metal of an unknown origin. Seemingly indestructible.

relics.name: Pen Nib
relics.description:
[BoardGame:Die5Icon]
[BoardGame:VulnIcon]
relics.flavorText: Holding the nib, you can see everyone ever slain by a previous owner of the pen. A violent history.

relics.name: Pocketwatch
relics.description:
[BoardGame:Die3Icon]
Draw 3 cards.
relics.flavorText: The hands seem stuck on the 3 o'clock position.

relics.name: Red Mask
relics.description:
[BoardGame:Die5Icon] [BoardGame:Die6Icon]
[BoardGame:WeakIcon]
relics.flavorText: This very stylish looking mask belongs to the leader of the Red Mask Bandits. Technically that makes you the leader now?

relics.name: Red Skull
relics.description: The first time you shuffle your draw pile each combat, gain [BoardGame:StrIcon] .
relics.flavorText: A small skull covered in ornamental paint.

relics.name: Regal Pillow
relics.description:
When you Rest:
Heal +3 HP.
relics.flavorText: Now you can get a proper night's rest.

relics.name: Runic Pyramid
relics.description:
Once per combat:
Retain any number of cards this turn.
Right-Click to activate.
relics.flavorText: The runes are indecipherable.

relics.name: Stone Calendar
relics.description:
[BoardGame:Die4Icon]
Deal 4 damage.
relics.flavorText: The passage of time is imperceptible in the Spire.

relics.name: Sundial
relics.description:
[BoardGame:Die2Icon]
Gain [E] [E] .
relics.flavorText: "Early man's foolish obsession with time caused them to look to the sky for guidance, hoping for something permanent." - Zoroth

relics.name: The Boot
relics.description:
[BoardGame:Die4Icon] [BoardGame:Die5Icon] [BoardGame:Die6Icon]
Deal 1 damage.
relics.flavorText: When wound up, the boot grows larger in size.

relics.name: Tungsten Rod
relics.description:
[BoardGame:Die5Icon]
1 [BoardGame:BlockIcon] to all players,
3 [BoardGame:BlockIcon] instead if solo.
relics.flavorText: It's very very heavy.

relics.name: Vajra
relics.description:
[BoardGame:Die2Icon]
Gain [BoardGame:StrIcon] . Lose [BoardGame:StrIcon] at end of turn.
relics.flavorText: An ornamental relic given to warriors displaying glory in battle.

relics.name: War Paint
relics.description:
Upgrade a starter Defend and another Skill, then discard this item.
Can't be used in combat or while otherwise occupied.
Right-Click to activate.
relics.flavorText: In the past, Ironclads would create wards using enchanted war paint before charging into battle.

relics.name: Whetstone
relics.description:
Upgrade a starter Strike and another Attack, then discard this item.
Can't be used in combat or while otherwise occupied.
Right-Click to activate.
relics.flavorText: "Flesh never beats steel." - Kublai the Great

relics.name: Blue Candle
relics.description:
Once per combat:
Exhaust up to 2 cards in your hand.
Right-Click to activate.
relics.flavorText: Holding this miniature trinket, you feel heavier and more stable.

relics.name: Golden Idol
relics.description:
End of combat:
Gain 1 Gold.
relics.flavorText: Made of solid gold, you feel richer just holding it.

relics.name: Gremlin Horn
relics.description:
[BoardGame:Die4Icon] Draw a card.
[BoardGame:Die5Icon] Gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: "Gremlin Nobs are capable of growing until the day they die. Remarkable." - Ranwid

relics.name: Horn Cleat
relics.description:
[BoardGame:Die1Icon] [BoardGame:Die2Icon]
1 [BoardGame:BlockIcon]
relics.flavorText: Pleasant to hold in the hand. What was it for?

relics.name: Meat on the Bone
relics.description:
End of combat:
If your HP is below 4 at the end of combat, your HP becomes 4.
relics.flavorText: The meat keeps replenishing, never seeming to fully run out.

relics.name: Mercury Hourglass
relics.description:
[BoardGame:Die1Icon] [BoardGame:Die2Icon]
Deal 1 damage to any row.
relics.flavorText: An enchanted hourglass that endlessly drips.

relics.name: Molten Egg
relics.description:
When you add an Attack to your deck, upgrade it.
Use 3x then discard.
relics.flavorText: The egg of a Phoenix. It glows red hot with a simmering lava.

relics.name: Mummified Hand
relics.description:
Once per combat:
Gain [E] [E] if you played a Power this turn.
Right-Click to activate.
relics.flavorText: Frequently twitches, especially when your pulse is high.

relics.name: Mutagenic Strength
relics.description:
Start of combat:
Gain [BoardGame:StrIcon] . Lose [BoardGame:StrIcon] at end of turn.
relics.flavorText: "The results seem fleeting, triggering when the subject is in danger." - Unknown

relics.name: Necronomicon
relics.description:
[BoardGame:Die1Icon]
Your next Attack this turn is played twice.
relics.flavorText: Only a fool would try and harness this evil power. At night your dreams are haunted by images of the book devouring your mind.

relics.name: Self-Forming Clay
relics.description:
Once per combat:
3 [BoardGame:BlockIcon] if you lost HP this combat.
Right-Click to activate.
relics.flavorText: "Most curious! It appears to form itself loosely on my thoughts! Tele-clay?" - Ranwid

relics.name: Ssserpent Head
relics.description: Whenever you enter a ? room, gain 2 Gold.
relics.flavorText: The most fulfilling of lives is that in which you can buy anything!

relics.name: Strike Dummy
relics.description: When you play a starter Strike, it deals +1 damage.
relics.flavorText: It's beat up.

relics.name: The Courier
relics.description:
Once per combat:
Look at the top card of the [BoardGame:PotionIcon] or [BoardGame:RelicIcon] deck.
Buy it or discard it.
Right-Click to activate.
relics.flavorText: The Merchant's personal pet!

relics.name: Toxic Egg
relics.description:
When you add a Skill to your deck, upgrade it.
Use 3x then discard.
relics.flavorText: "What a marvelous discovery! This appears to be the inert egg of some magical creature. Who or what created this?" - Ranwid

relics.name: Bird-Faced Urn
relics.description:
When you play a Power:
1 [BoardGame:BlockIcon]
relics.flavorText: This urn shows the crow god Mazaleth looking mischievous.

relics.name: Calipers
relics.description:
Once per combat:
[BoardGame:BlockIcon] Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.
Right-Click to activate.
relics.flavorText: "These would be good here."

relics.name: Charon's Ashes
relics.description:
[BoardGame:Die1Icon] [BoardGame:Die2Icon]
You may Exhaust a card to deal 2 damage.
Right-Click to activate.
relics.flavorText: Charon was said to be the god of rebirth, eternally dying and reviving in a burst of flame.

relics.name: Dead Branch
relics.description:
Once per combat:
Draw a card for each card in your Exhaust pile.
Right-Click to activate.
relics.flavorText: The branch of a tree from a forgotten era.

relics.name: Du-Vu Doll
relics.description:
Gain [BoardGame:StrIcon] when you draw a Curse.
Lose that [BoardGame:StrIcon] at end of turn.
relics.flavorText: A doll devised to gain strength from malicious energy.

relics.name: Gambling Chip
relics.description:
Once per room:
Reroll the die.
relics.flavorText: You can see a small inscription on one side. It reads: "Bear's Lucky Chip!"

relics.name: Golden Eye
relics.description:
Once per combat:
Scry 3.
Right-Click to activate.
relics.flavorText: See into the minds of those nearby, predicting their future moves.

relics.name: Ice Cream
relics.description:
Start of turn:
Gain your leftover Energy [E] from last turn.
(Max Energy is 6.)
relics.flavorText: "Delicious!"

relics.name: Incense Burner
relics.description: [BoardGame:Die6Icon] You can't lose more than 1 HP this round.
relics.flavorText: The smoke imbues its owner with the spirit of the burned.

relics.name: Old Coin
relics.description:
Gain 10 Gold, then discard this relic.
If this appears at The Merchant or The Courier, discard it and draw again.
relics.flavorText: Unique coins are highly valued by merchants for their historical value and rare metallic composition.

relics.name: Peace Pipe
relics.description:
When you Rest:
You may also remove a card.
relics.flavorText: Clears the mind and cleanses the soul.

relics.name: Secret Portal
relics.description: Upon pickup, move to any room above the current floor.
relics.flavorText: WELCOME TO WARP ZONE!

relics.name: Wing Boots
relics.description:
You may ignore paths when moving up to the next room.
Use this 3x, then discard it.
relics.flavorText: Stylish.

relics.name: Merchant Event (Discarded)
relics.description: A Merchant was drawn on floor 2 and subsequently discarded.

relics.name: Monster Event (Discarded)
relics.description: A hallway encounter was drawn on floor 2 and subsequently discarded.

relics.name: Old Coin (Discarded)
relics.description: Old Coin was drawn at The Merchant or The Courier and subsequently discarded.

relics.name: Prismatic Shard
relics.description: Grants 2 Orb slots.
relics.flavorText: Looking through the shard, you are able to see entirely new perspectives.

relics.name: Astrolabe
relics.description:
Upgrade 3 cards.

Use this immediately, then discard it.
relics.flavorText: A tool to glean invaluable knowledge from the stars.

relics.name: Black Blood
relics.description:
End of combat:
Heal 2 HP.
relics.flavorText: The rage grows darker.

relics.name: Calling Bell
relics.description:
Gain [BoardGame:RelicIcon] [BoardGame:RelicIcon] [BoardGame:RelicIcon] .
Gain a Curse.

Use this immediately, then discard it.
relics.flavorText: This dark iron bell rang 3 times when you found it, but now stays silent.

relics.name: Coffee Dripper
relics.description:
Start of turn:
Gain [E] .

At Campfires:
You can't Rest.
relics.flavorText: "Yes, another cup please. Back to work. Back to work!" - The Architect

relics.name: Cursed Key
relics.description:
Start of turn:
Gain [E] .

When obtained,
gain 2 Curses.
relics.flavorText: You can feel the malicious energy emanating from the key. Power comes at a price.

relics.name: Ectoplasm
relics.description:
Start of turn:
Gain [E] .

You can't gain gold.
relics.flavorText: This blob of slime and energy seems to pulse with life.

relics.name: Empty Cage
relics.description:
Remove 2 cards.

Use this immediately, then discard it.
relics.flavorText: "How unusual to cage that which you worship." - Ranwid

relics.name: Enchiridion
relics.description:
Gain [BoardGame:RarepackIcon] . Look at 5 cards instead of 3.

Use this immediately, then discard it.
relics.flavorText: The legendary journal of an ancient lich.

relics.name: Frozen Core
relics.description: End of turn: 1 [BoardGame:BlockIcon]
relics.flavorText: The crack in your core has been filled with a pulsating cold energy.

relics.name: Fusion Hammer
relics.description:
Start of turn:
Gain [E] .

At Campfires:
You can't Smith.
relics.flavorText: Once wielded, the owner can never let go.

relics.name: Holy Water
relics.description:
Twice per combat:
Gain [E] .
Right-Click to activate.
relics.flavorText: Collected from a time before the Spire.

relics.name: Mark of Pain
relics.description:
Start of turn:
Gain [E] .

If your HP would go above 6, it becomes 6.
relics.flavorText: This brand was used by the northern tribes to signify warriors who had mastered pain in battle.

relics.name: Ninja Scroll
relics.description:
Once per combat:
1 [BoardGame:HitIcon] [BoardGame:HitIcon]
Treat each [BoardGame:HitIcon] as a separate 0 cost Attack.
Right-Click to activate.
relics.flavorText: Contains the secrets of assassination.

relics.name: Orrery
relics.description:
Gain [BoardGame:CardpackIcon] [BoardGame:CardpackIcon] [BoardGame:CardpackIcon] [BoardGame:CardpackIcon] .

Use this immediately, then discard it.
relics.flavorText: "Once you understand the universe..." - Zoroth

relics.name: Pandora's Box
relics.description:
Transform 3 cards.

Use this immediately, then discard it.
relics.flavorText: You have a bad feeling about opening this.

relics.name: Ring of the Serpent
relics.description:
Start of turn:
Draw a card.
relics.flavorText: Your ring has morphed and changed forms.

relics.name: Snecko Eye
relics.description:
[BoardGame:Die1Icon] [BoardGame:Die2Icon] Draw 2 cards.
[BoardGame:Die3Icon] [BoardGame:Die4Icon] Gain [E] .
[BoardGame:Die5Icon] [BoardGame:Die6Icon] Gain [BoardGame:DazedIcon] .
relics.flavorText: An eye of a fallen snecko. Much larger than you imagined.

relics.name: Sozu
relics.description:
Start of turn:
Gain [E] .

You can't gain [BoardGame:PotionIcon] .
relics.flavorText: You notice that magical liquids seem to lose their properties when near this relic.

relics.name: Tiny House
relics.description:
Gain [BoardGame:CardpackIcon] , [BoardGame:PotionIcon] , and 3 Gold.
Upgrade a card.

Use this immediately, then discard it.
relics.flavorText: "A near perfect implementation of miniaturization. My finest work to date, but still not adequate." - The Architect

relics.name: White Beast Statue
relics.description:
End of combat:
Gain [BoardGame:PotionIcon] .
relics.flavorText: A small white statue of a creature you have never seen before.

relics.name: Wrist Blade
relics.description: Your 0 cost Attacks deal +1 damage on each [BoardGame:HitIcon] . (Include [BoardGame:ShivIcon] .)
relics.flavorText: Handy for assassinations.

relics.name: Dolly's Mirror
relics.description:
[BoardGame:Die1Icon]
Trigger a die relic ability. Its owner gains the effect.
relics.flavorText: "I look funny in this."

relics.name: The Abacus
relics.description:
Once per combat:
+1 to the die result.
( [BoardGame:Die6Icon] becomes [BoardGame:Die1Icon] )
relics.flavorText: "One...Two...Three..."

relics.name: Toolbox
relics.description:
Once per combat:
-1 to the die result.
( [BoardGame:Die1Icon] becomes [BoardGame:Die6Icon] )
relics.flavorText: A tool for every job.

potions.name: Attack Potion
potions.description: The next Attack you play this turn is played twice.

potions.name: Flex Potion
potions.description: Gain [BoardGame:StrIcon] . Lose [BoardGame:StrIcon] at end of turn.

potions.name: Ghost in a Jar
potions.description: You can't lose more than 1 HP this turn.

potions.name: Skill Potion
potions.description: The next Skill you play this turn is played twice.

potions.name: Cunning Potion
potions.description:
1 [BoardGame:HitIcon] 1 [BoardGame:HitIcon] 1 [BoardGame:HitIcon]
Treat each [BoardGame:HitIcon] as a separate 0 cost Attack.

potions.name: Distilled Chaos
potions.description:
Draw 3 cards.
Immediately play them in any order for 0 Energy.

potions.name: Gambler's Brew
potions.description: Change the die to any number (before accepting the roll).

potions.name: Liquid Memories
potions.description: Choose a card in your discard pile and return it to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

potions.name: Purity Potion
potions.description: Exhaust up to 3 cards in your hand.

potions.name: Fairy in a Bottle
potions.description: When you would die, heal to 2 HP instead and discard this potion.

keywords.name: Poison
keywords.description: Poisoned creatures lose HP at the end of the player's turn.

keywords.name: Channel
keywords.description: Channeling an Orb puts it into your first empty slot. If you have no empty slots, one of your Orbs is Evoked to make room.

keywords.name: Dark
keywords.description: Orb: When Evoked, deals damage based on active Powers.

keywords.name: Evoke
keywords.description: Consume one of your Orbs and use its Evoke effect.

keywords.name: Scry
keywords.description: Look at the top X cards of your draw pile. You may discard any of them.

keywords.name: [BoardGame:ShivIcon] Shivs
keywords.description: Shivs [BoardGame:ShivIcon] are tokens that may be used whenever you could play a card to deal 1 [BoardGame:HitIcon] .

keywords.name: [BoardGame:VulnIcon] Vulnerable
keywords.description: Deal 2x damage on each [BoardGame:HitIcon] in the next Attack, then remove a [BoardGame:VulnIcon] token.

keywords.name: [BoardGame:WeakIcon] Weak
keywords.description: Deal -1 damage on each [BoardGame:HitIcon] in the next Attack, then remove a [BoardGame:WeakIcon] token.

keywords.name: Wrath
keywords.description:
+1 to your [BoardGame:HitIcon] .
End of turn:
Take 1 damage.

mods.name: The Board Game
mods.credits: Original BG Game Design by Gary Dworetsky.  Special thanks to #modding-technical and #sts-playtesting-public.
mods.description: Video game adaptation of the board game adaptation of the video game.
